name: FireflyForest
description:
Game made for the Quarantine Game Jam.

You have to catch as much fireflies as possible, trying to avoid dark creatures.

Try your best!

Commands: 

(WASD) or (Directional arrows) = Move

Space bar = Jump (You can do double jumps)

Made by: Domenico Di Stefano, Samuele Principato and Roberta Alosi
